column1: -Make sure the battle system works in relativity. Mario should be able to identify where an enemy is in real time instead of being programmed to do a specific animation for each individual enemy
-Give the Goomba 3HP so it has a chance to attack
-First Strikes (jumping on the enemy to initiate a battle)
-The timing of the A press (Has to be as Mario lands on the goomba, usually a 6 frame window to input it.)
-Mario's 2nd Jump (Mario does two jumps if the A button is pressed, instead of extra damage)
-Blocking (mario can reduce the damage by 1 with a well timed A press)
